attributes.action: I would like long hair allowed for boys/men in school and at work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am 14 and have been struggling all my life with not being allowed long hair. I think it is discrimination to boys with long hair. You wouldn't say to a religious muslim women/girl, " you are not allowed to wear a burka at school/work". That is discrimination. You wouldn't say to a African, " you are not allowed to work/study here". That is discrimination. You wouldn't say to a boy/man with long hair, " you are not allowed long hair here. Either cut it off or get out". That is discrimination, but why do "you" still do it. It's not fair. Why. I ask teacher, headmasters and my family and they never answer me with a proper answer, they just say " that's the way life is". It is my right as a person to be who i want , to look the way i want and to say something when it makes me feel sad. When i hear the words "get your hair cut".It makes me want to cry. My headmaster said to me when i joined my school, " there will be no bullying of any kind at this school". To a bully makes you feel bad about yourself, makes you think your not good enough. So why do the teachers bully me, and countless other boys over the country. I want a choice not a rule. MY decision, MY life, MY rules.
